paintings.title: Mona Lisa
paintings.description: The Mona Lisa is a half-length portrait painting by Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci. Considered an archetypal masterpiece of the Italian Renaissance, it has been described as the best known, the most visited, the most written about, the most sung about, the most parodied work of art in the world.

paintings.title: Starry Night Over the Rhône
paintings.description: Starry Night Over the Rhône is one of Vincent van Gogh's paintings of Arles at nighttime. It was painted at a spot on the bank of the Rhône River that was only a one or two-minute walk from the Yellow House on the Place Lamartine which Van Gogh was renting at the time.

paintings.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
paintings.description: Girl with a Pearl Earring is an oil painting by Dutch Golden Age painter Johannes Vermeer, dated c. 1665. Going by various titles over the centuries, it became known by its present title towards the end of the 20th century after the large pearl earring worn by the girl portrayed there.

paintings.title: Starry Night
paintings.description: Starry Night is one of the most famous paintings by Dutch artist Vincent van Gogh. Painted in 1889, it depicts a swirling night sky over a quiet town, with a large cypress tree in the foreground.
paintings.location: Museum of Modern Art, New York

paintings.title: The Boy in a Red Vest
paintings.description: The Boy in a Red Vest, also known as The Boy in the Red Waistcoat, is a painting by French artist Paul Cézanne. It depicts a young boy in traditional Italian attire.

paintings.title: The Return of the Prodigal Son
paintings.description: The Return of the Prodigal Son is a late work by Rembrandt, completed in the final years of his life. The painting depicts the moment the prodigal son returns to his father in the biblical parable.

paintings.title: The Entombment of Christ
paintings.description: The Entombment of Christ is a painting by Italian artist Caravaggio, depicting the burial of Jesus Christ. It is one of Caravaggio's most well-known religious works.

paintings.title: The Descent from the Cross
paintings.description: The Descent from the Cross is a painting by Peter Paul Rubens, showing the body of Christ being taken down from the cross after his crucifixion.
